title: Rapid transit
brief_description: Forms of rapid transit are vital links in a balanced transportation system. The variety of existing systems in use in the United States and in Toronto, Canada, are shown and the film then goes on to forecast the forms of the new rapid transit facilities soon to become available for use in big cities.
